Package vrml

VRML 97 Specification, Annex B (normative), Java platform scripting reference: class and method definitions which enable Script nodes to interact with VRML scenes.

Package vrml Description

VRML 97 Specification, Annex B (normative), Java platform scripting reference: class and method definitions which enable Script nodes to interact with VRML scenes.

This implementation is for reference purposes only. No source code is provided in class bodies since they are unique for each browser implementation.

https://www.web3d.org/technicalinfo/specifications/vrml97/part1/java.html
